title: Accused in K’taka Temple Poisoning Row Is Not a Christian Convert
subtitle: A viral post on social media claims that one among the prime accused in the Karnataka temple poisoning case, resulting in the death of at least 15 devotees, is a Christian convert by the name of ‘Sylvia/Silvia Ambika’.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
However, searches by the name 'Nagesh Segal' threw up no results on Facebook.

The claim has also been shared by several pages on Facebook such as 'Presstitutes - Urba Naxals', and ‘India Cause’.
